whole_object: When the cat's away, the stuffed animals will play—looks like Teddy's taken the best seat in the house for his bear-thlon of pawsome TV shows.
single_object:
- Floor lamp: This floor lamp stands so tall, you'd think it was trying to ceiling the deal with the ceiling!
- Sofa: The sofa's so tired from all the sitting jobs, it's practically reclining its responsibilities.
- Pillow: The pillow has such a plush job, you'd think it never loses sleep over anything.
- Teddy bear: The teddy bear sits there like he owns the place, totally un-bear-able entitlement.
- Curtains: The curtains never act shady, they always come clean about who's coming to the window.
- Glass table: The glass table is so transparent about its feelings, it can't help reflecting on everything.
- Chairs: These chairs are such good supporters, they've got your back without any backtalk.
- Picture frame: This picture frame is quite the character; it's always bordering on the edge of a joke.
multi_object:
- Floor lamp  
- Sofa  
- "The floor lamp tried to brighten up the sofa's day, but it just ended up casting shade!"  

- Sofa  
- Teddy bear  
- "The sofa thought it was the comfiest seat in the house, but the teddy bear claimed it was just a plush competition!"  

- Pillow  
- Glass table  
- "The pillow was feeling a bit deflated after realizing the glass table was the real centerpiece of the room!"  

- Teddy bear  
- Curtains  
- "The teddy bear tried to peek out from behind the curtains, but they were too busy making a scene!"  

- Curtains  
- Picture frame  
- "The curtains were always drawn to the picture frame, thinking it was the best view in the house!"  

- Glass table  
- Chairs  
- "The glass table felt transparent about its feelings, but the chairs just couldn't take a seat on the matter!"  

- Chairs  
- Floor lamp  
- "The chairs were tired of being left out, so they decided to stand up to the floor lamp's bright ideas!"  

- Picture frame  
- Pillow  
- "The picture frame was framed for being too picture-perfect, while the pillow just wanted to be the softest star!"

multi_object_dict.object_sentence: "The floor lamp tried to brighten up the sofa's day, but it just ended up casting shade!"
"The sofa thought it was the comfiest seat in the house, but the teddy bear claimed it was just a plush competition!"
"The pillow was feeling a bit deflated after realizing the glass table was the real centerpiece of the room!"
"The teddy bear tried to peek out from behind the curtains, but they were too busy making a scene!"
"The curtains were always drawn to the picture frame, thinking it was the best view in the house!"
"The glass table felt transparent about its feelings, but the chairs just couldn't take a seat on the matter!"
"The chairs were tired of being left out, so they decided to stand up to the floor lamp's bright ideas!"
"The picture frame was framed for being too picture-perfect, while the pillow just wanted to be the softest star!"
